title: Two-wheeler industry expects robust growth in upcoming festive season: TVS
description: The two-wheeler industry is set for strong festive season sales, driven by a revival in rural demand and good monsoon conditions, says TVS Motor's Aniruddha Haldar. Rural demand is outpacing urban areas, with scooters gaining popularity. Improved rural infrastructure and increased personal mobility also contribute to the growth, particularly for scooters.
